name: InnoFinance Oy
overview:
Innofinance Oy is a venture capital company that invests in small and medium-sized Finnish companies. Our offices are located in Espoo, Lappeenranta and Tampere.

Through our five funds, we are involved in the activities of some 60 growing companies.

Innofinance is owned by its key personnel. As entrepreneurs, we are strongly committed to developing and expanding our target companies. Our personnel has 100 years of combined experience in managing organizations and developing business operations. We also have 35 years of combined experience in venture capital operations.
